
A careless admin reused a prime across multiple RSA keys. Recover the message: ciphertext1: 694768944573414013585639836106503761849261503810646177908825778474953043657760216461039822553800357370785768566873085906300968557243028112176843768569641981178268428226678868428542551599829957635354215628995553685193801977227067614, ciphertext2: 260067757256502072770770637754526658079579809298463864552228533137279928854416770801265365432834368044401392389325289553503790035029965772365685608359159065940013538565062837903306289742002024725753953435837724973200786490546823371

n1=956324906526987114356516187668748209892502180604786128146953142970908705953779348413720116015587095284276118008735788770651532975006776204656527826657142812762759880700465385777233048224046611080448339546352780825348272648274241323, n2=609844966696440364283399261624263090430655165260302448787909099729458318513235004963987150573416038662368174429324463495245703161531270915147516897211000276136917652325537383823561977741866468558512210485871431017913840419571770777, e=142716394832932504083229737836910310863744846952274078915057964704531150818530320440984796481979818830585806975974162744619017794285696661555742169058505632873399238271748292418334169045305430676492059808312030102023127187432777371

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{2mkuflnh}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 694768944573414013585639836106503761849261503810646177908825778474953043657760216461039822553800357370785768566873085906300968557243028112176843768569641981178268428226678868428542551599829957635354215628995553685193801977227067614, ciphertext2: 260067757256502072770770637754526658079579809298463864552228533137279928854416770801265365432834368044401392389325289553503790035029965772365685608359159065940013538565062837903306289742002024725753953435837724973200786490546823371
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=956324906526987114356516187668748209892502180604786128146953142970908705953779348413720116015587095284276118008735788770651532975006776204656527826657142812762759880700465385777233048224046611080448339546352780825348272648274241323, n2=609844966696440364283399261624263090430655165260302448787909099729458318513235004963987150573416038662368174429324463495245703161531270915147516897211000276136917652325537383823561977741866468558512210485871431017913840419571770777, e=142716394832932504083229737836910310863744846952274078915057964704531150818530320440984796481979818830585806975974162744619017794285696661555742169058505632873399238271748292418334169045305430676492059808312030102023127187432777371
